Nginx proxy manager.description:
Managing Nginx proxy hosts with a simple, powerful interface.

Based on a custom OCI image, available for amd64 and arm64 architecture.
Nginx proxy manager.more_info:
First time login

Default username isadmin@example.comand password ischangeme. Make sure to change both the username and password after the first login.

4443.description: Port where nginx will listen for https connections
4443.label: Https port [e.g. 4443]

8080.description: Port where nginx will listen for http connections
8080.label: Http port [e.g. 8080]

PGID.description: Enter a valid GID to use along with the same UID. It (or the above UID) must have full permissions to all shares mapped in the previous step.
PGID.label: GID
